Constructs a new directory iterator.

@1@ Constructs the end iterator.

@2@ Constructs a directory iterator that refers to the first directory entry of a directory identified by {{c|p}}. If {{c|p}} refers to a non-existing file or not a directory, returns the end iterator.

@1@ {{unreviewed noexcept}}

@2@ {{c|filesystem_error}} if an error occurs. The exception object is constructed with {{c|p}} as an argument.

@3@ {{unreviewed noexcept}}

===Notes===
To iterate over the current directory, construct the iterator as {{c|directory_iterator(".")}} instead of {{c|directory_iterator("")}}.
